Syntax debug.Dump VALUE Returns string {{ $data := "" }} {{ $p := "data/books.json" }} {{ with resources.Get $p }} {{ $opts := dict "delimiter" "," }} {{ $data = . | transform.Unmarshal $opts }} {{ else }} {{ errorf "Unable to get resource %q" $p }} {{ end }} <pre>{{ debug.Dump $data }}</pre> []interface {}{ map[string]interface {}{
